title: Hovering/ Body Blocking
body: So I wanted to ask for a solution either in game or a change Riot could make about large characters(model wise eg. Gragas, 6 stack Cho Gath, Alistar) covering or standing over small sized ( Kog Maw, Ezreal, Annie) carries so using abilities like a Naut ult or some lock on is impossible due to the fact that you can't click them. I've had games where a Kog was covered by Ali and Cho Gath and we couldn't do anything. Even unable to smite Baron due to Gragas on it and smiting him instead. Please respond Riot.

replies.body: Gluttony does have some purpose after all :)

I'm pretty sure that is the point of large hitboxes...
If Riot didn't want to it to be then why would they make a potion that would increase your size (25%)? {{item:2138}} 

It makes tanks be better at their jobs (being a meatshield).

Lulu has that ability as well, as does Zac.
Dafaq, you can't smite Baron when Gragas in on it? I REALLY doubt that... Gragas doesn't have that big of a model...
Thats SOOO TRUE OMG I HATE WHEN THAT HAPPENDS RITO PLEASE FIXXX!!!
